name: Strawberry and Snap Pea Salad
author: Mojito Mama
summary: Doing the eat-for-your-blood-type diet. This salad is a yummy treat I can eat!! Took fresh local strawberries and some friends' home-grown sugar snap peas and tried to recreate this salad I had read in a mystery book years ago. Goes well with a nice steak from the grill. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
directions: Bring a pot of water to boil and place a steamer insert in the pot
Place peas in steamer, cover, and cook until bright green, about 30 seconds
Drain and run under cold water until peas are cool; set aside
Whisk olive oil, raspberry vinegar, and Dijon mustard in a bowl until well blended
Allow vinegar dressing to rest for a few minutes
Combine sugar snap peas and strawberry slices in a large bowl
Pour dressing over pea mixture, gently tossing to combine
Serve immediately or chill for up to 1 hour
